resources.string:
DISCLAIMER: This application was built for research purposes only. Do NOT misuse it for malicious activity.

NFCGate is licensed under Apache License, v2.0
Xposed is licensed under Apache License, v2.0
Protobuf is licensed under BSD 3-Clause license

We take no responsibility for, and will not be liable for, the application misbehaving due to technical issues beyond our control.
A bug in Android 6.0.1 on the Nexus 5X prevents it from reading the hist bytes.
Xposed module could not be found. Ensure Xposed is installed and the module is enabled.
Native hook could not be found. Cloning and relaying in Tag mode may not work properly.
Your NFC Chip could not be detected.
Your device does not support HostCardEmulation and is not supported as Tag emulator in Relay/Replay mode.
Your device does not support NFC or you turned it off. Please enable NFC to use NFCGate.
